headline: Netflix Antitrust Probe Puts Warner Bros. Discovery Mega Deal Under Question
summary: Netflix, NasdaqGS:NFLX, is facing expanded Department of Justice scrutiny over its proposed $82.7b acquisition of Warner Bros. Discovery. Regulators are examining whether the deal and Netflix's conduct raise material antitrust and potential monopoly concerns. Senate hearings are also assessing how the merger could affect competition and choice across the streaming market. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:NFLX, this antitrust probe comes at a time when the stock trades at $82.2, with a 1 year...
